extends Entity

      it sets the speed of monster.
      void step()
      it overrides entity step, updates the direction and position of the monster it calls the strategy updateDirection in runtime so it does not know which strategy does it statically.
      void updateState(TowerType towerType)
      updates the state of the monster given the tower type from the game it uses the state variable to reach and do changes it does not know anything state specific.

      • monsterState

        protected MonsterState monsterState

    • Method Detail

      • step

        public void step()
        it overrides entity step, updates the direction and position of the monster it calls the strategy updateDirection in runtime so it does not know which strategy does it statically. update direction is made my concrete strategy function
        Specified by:
        step in class Entity

      • getAttacked

        public double getAttacked(double damage,
                          TowerType towerType)
        returns remaining health to game. called from Game instance. It calculates the damage done to monster and shows it using red rectangle

      • updateState

        public void updateState(TowerType towerType)
        updates the state of the monster given the tower type from the game it uses the state variable to reach and do changes it does not know anything state specific. Each state implements these method to make state design pattern. it takes TowerType enum @param towerType

      • setMonsterState

        public void setMonsterState(MonsterState newState)
        called from the concrete state classes and changes the states it takes the MonsterState@param newState

      • getCurrentCenterPosition

        public Vector2D getCurrentCenterPosition()
        it returns the current center position of the monster
        Returns:
        Vector2D currentCenter

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(double speed)
        it sets the speed of monster. Called from specific concrete state MonsterIceState double @param speed

      • decrementHealthByFive

        public void decrementHealthByFive()
        it is used to decrement healt of monster. Called from Specific MonsterPoisonState

      • getMonsterDirection

        public Vector2D getMonsterDirection()

      • getMonsterKillReward

        public int getMonsterKillReward()
        Returns:
        int reward of the killed monster

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        It overrides entity paint. Draws monster as a white rectangle Then it calls the monsterstate.paint() by doing that it does not know anythong state specific Concrete state Class overrides this and makes the painting Graphics @param g
